SELECT m.organ_name as organName, m.dpt_name as deptName, m.doc_name as doctorName, m. NAME as patientName, m.md_dis_name as diseaseName, m.see_doc_dt as visitingTime FROM medicalrecord m WHERE m.see_doc_dt >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND m.see_doc_dt < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND m.DPT_CODE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{deptId}),'%')
AND m.doc_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{doctorName}),'%')
order by m.see_doc_dt desc
